DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES: I. Characterize inheritance patterns of mutations in patients with beta-oxidation disorders.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Protein Translocation in Patients With Beta-Oxidation Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE: Patients undergo clinical and molecular analysis of beta-oxidation enzyme metabolism. The evaluation includes a urinary metabolite profile, and DNA and familial studies.
DOC.criteria: PROTOCOL ENTRY CRITERIA: Betaoxidation disorder, including: Mediumchain acylcoenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Longchain 3hydroxyacyl coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Verylongchain acylcoenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Shortchain 3hydroxyacyl coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Longchain 3ketoacylcoenzyme A thiolase deficiency Trifunctional protein deficiency Patient age: 1 day and over
